name: Counterintelligence Tactics
description: Defensive measures to detect and neutralize enemy intelligence operations.

cards.title: Double Agent Identification
cards.description: Recognizing and handling infiltrators within an organization.

cards.title: Disinformation & Psychological Warfare

bulletpoints: Seed false intelligence through secure channels
